alert.note: Alert for Glacier; Lewis and Clark; Pondera; Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 11:38PM MDT until June 09 at 1:30AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central and west central Montana, including the following counties, in north central Montana, Glacier, Pondera and Teton. In west central Montana, Lewis and Clark. * WHEN...Until 900 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1138 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Heart Butte, Pishkun Reservoir, Dupuyer and Nilan Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Glacier; Lewis and Clark; Pondera; Teton
